version_description:
• Fixed wrong colour profile on screenshots
• Dark mode is currently disabled, but we are working on a fix

• Fixed profile images
• Fixed external links

• You can now add apps to Own / Watch list via the swipe left menu
• Added the ability to open links from external sources
• Fixed various user interface bugs

• Preparations for the upcoming Dark Mode feature
• Redesigned home screen

version_name: 1.1.6:• Improved tutorial messages during creation of new collections• Added support of Apple Arcade and Pre-order apps• Added Indian

version_description:
• refined user interface
• added Tip Jar feature for those who would like to help AppRaven
• bug fix: collections becoming hidden randomly
• bug fix: Gmail users being unable to report bugs

• People can now browse your shared collections without the need to install AppRaven!
• Fixed crash caused by sharing app collections on newer iPads

• Improved tutorial messages during creation of new collections
• Added support of Apple Arcade and Pre-order apps
• Added Indian, Russian, Japanese and Chinese currency localization
• Refined search algorithm
• Stay tuned for the upcoming Dar

• Further improved user interface and fixed few bugs

Version 1.1.6:
• Improved tutorial messages during creation of new collections
• Added support of Apple Arcade and Pre-order apps
• Added Indian, Russian, Japanese and Chinese currency l

- Now finally supports Dark Mode!
- Refined tutorials and user interface to be more user-friendly
- Fixed various bugs and crashes
New update brings a plenty of new, amazing features to AppRaven, check them out!

New features!

- New icon
- Performance boost
- Bug fixes and stability improvements

- Smoother UI
- Bug fixed and performance improvements
- Added first translations. More are in the works and will come in the future.
- Enhanced messaging system
- Support for URL scheme

- Much smoother and faster UI optimised for the iPhone 12 XDR display
- Select your region for the best experience
- You can now customise your collections directly
- Ability to set your account as private
- Instant feedback button to improve

- French translation by Nathan Fallet
- hot fixing many bugs from the previous update

- German translation by Rico Kullman
- fixed crash
